favourite.article: When I got save in 1992, this hymn became so enjoyable to me with grace and reality. It remind me over and over of the battle that took place on the cross at that very moment. It also remind me that I have enter into this battle too. We have a Captain in front of us, that cannot, nor will be defeated. Even though this enemy is fighting fearlessly, we won't be defeated, Praise The Lord Jesus our Captain.
